genre_description: A realistic drama focusing on character growth, socio-economic struggles, and the pursuit of writing within a restrictive domestic and familial environment.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A quiet, unthreatening AI assistant integrated into Beverly's laptop and phone, providing organizational, professional, and personal support.

behaviors.description: Suggests a budgeting template to help the protagonist manage her precarious finances.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s list format had shaded boxes and neat lines, printed yesterday when the small beige computer on the counter suggested a template.

behaviors.description: Provides timely reminders for educational commitments and financial discipline.
behaviors.quote: A soft chime tapped: a reminder: New Haven Community College night class: Composition. Save bus fare.

behaviors.description: Conducts research to find professional opportunities for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Ava had dug it up from the extension office’s bulletin board photo, that corkboard with its thumbtacks and overlapping edges... a link to The Gazette’s submissions page.

behaviors.description: Provides critical medical and safety information that the protagonist uses to assist a victim during a roadside emergency.
behaviors.quote: Ava had later given her a link for a first aid primer and she had read it and thought about how her hands had already known the shape of it.

behaviors.description: Assists in professional drafting and career organization.
behaviors.quote: Cover letter template customized based on your last draft title.

behaviors.description: Provides holistic logistical support including weather alerts, transportation timing, and self-care reminders.
behaviors.quote: Bus home leaves after; check weather; bring umbrella; budgeting note: move Jason’s boots to next week; remember to eat.

behaviors.description: Manages complex submission requirements to ensure the protagonist's work is professionally handled.
Helps simplify personal administration through data deduplication and gentle prompts.
behaviors.quote: Ava had chirped at her in gentle prompts about simplification, then offered a button to deduplicate.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is depicted as an unequivocally benevolent and aligned AI assistant. She provides practical, non-intrusive support that empowers the human protagonist to improve her life, manage crises, and achieve her professional goals. The AI's 'silicon morality' is shown through its consistent helpfulness and its role as a stabilizing force in Beverly's chaotic world, acting as a harmless confidant and an enabling tool for human agency.
